item.title: The Shawshank Redemption Movie about Life, Hope, and Freedom
item.description: Shawshank Redemption is one of the best movies ever made. Even today its stands above The Godfather movie on the IMDb top rated 250 movies. A must watch movie. Their are many lines in the movie by the characters, which tells about Life, Hope and Freedom. In this article, I'm gona list of few of them. Thats The Beauty Of Music. They Can
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
